item.description:
Join the fun and their “Crusade against Hunger” in which you will receive $2 off general admission for each Big Y brand canned food you donate, up to 4 cans will be accepted for a 50% discount off of the $16 admission price. All food will be donated to the Connecticut Food Bank. Also, on Sunday there will be a $2 reduced admission for children.

We will be leaving right after sangha @ 12:15 p.m. to Hebron. We will have lunch there. The Faire closes at 6 p.m. We are looking for carpooling volunteers. Come and join the fun. Rain date: 10/4.

visit http://www.ctfaire.co...

group.name: Buddhist Faith Fellowship in Middletown, Ct

item.name: The Connecticut Renaissance Faire Field Trip
